overview: From 2025-07-12 to 2025-07-13, elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Failed to create Twitter Client (1.0.14)
topIssues.author: RolandOne
topIssues.body:
Hi All,

I am trying to migrate my agent to V2 by starting from a fresh elizaos create

i just add the twitter plugin and update it to 1.0.14

But I am getting this error.



```
[2025-07-07 07:52:08] INFO: Successfully authenticated with Twitter API v2
[2025-07-07 07:52:15] ERROR: Failed to create Twitter client for b850bc30-45f8-0041-a00a-83df46d8555d:
    message: "(Error) Failed query: insert into \"memories\" (\"id\", \"type\", \"createdAt\", \"content\", \"entityId\", \"agentId\", \"roomId\", \"worldId\", \"unique\", \"metadata\") values ($1, $2, $3, $4::jsonb, $5, $6, $7, default, $8, $9::jsonb)\nparams: 9312217b-6dbc-0894-b4aa-755595692569,messages,+057484-08-29T23:00:00.000Z,[object Object],4707c098-1208-0ec3-9161-81ccc2cb95ba,b850bc30-45f8-0041-a00a-83df46d8555d,9312217b-6dbc-0894-b4aa-755595692569,true,[object Object]"
    stack: [
      "Error: Failed query: insert into \"memories\" (\"id\", \"type\", \"createdAt\", \"content\", \"entityId\", \"agentId\", \"roomId\", \"worldId\", \"unique\", \"metadata\") values ($1, $2, $3, $4::jsonb, $5, $6, $7, default, $8, $9::jsonb)",
      "params: 9312217b-6dbc-0894-b4aa-755595692569,messages,+057484-08-29T23:00:00.000Z,[object Object],4707c098-1208-0ec3-9161-81ccc2cb95ba,b850bc30-45f8-0041-a00a-83df46d8555d,9312217b-6dbc-0894-b4aa-755595692569,true,[object Object]",
      "at PglitePreparedQuery.queryWithCache
```


`ERROR: Eliza(b850bc30-45f8-0041-a00a-83df46d8555d) - Failed to register service twitter: Failed query: insert into "memories" ("id", "type", "createdAt", "content", "entityId", "agentId", "roomId", "worldId", "unique", "metadata") values ($1, $2, $3, $4::jsonb, $5, $6, $7, default, $8, $9::jsonb)
params: 9312217b-6dbc-0894-b4aa-755595692569,messages,+057484-08-29T23:00:00.000Z,[object Object],4707c098-1208-0ec3-9161-81ccc2cb95ba,b850bc30-45f8-0041-a00a-83df46d8555d,9312217b-6dbc-0894-b4aa-755595692569,true,[object Object]`

The date returned is formatted +057484

topContributors.summary: wookosh: Modified 6 files with 4 commits (+90/-16 lines), focusing on making tests work and other work, and provided 1 review with comments. The activity pattern shows very consistent work.
